result.html: beidh scéalaíocht ar an rud a bheas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ scéalaíoċt ar an rud a ḃeas anseo nuair imeos séPeople will tell stories about this when it's gone.

result.eng: Will the sun be much bigger when we're beside it?
result.ga: an mbeidh an ghrian mórán níos mó nuair a bheimid ag a taobh
result.orig: an mbeidh an ghrian mórán níos mó nuair a bheimid ag a taobh
result.html: an mbeidh an ghrian mórán níos mó nuair a bheimid ag a taobhWill the sun be much bigger when we're beside it?
result.ponchtml: an mbeiḋ an ġrian mórán níos mó nuair a ḃeimid ag a taoḃWill the sun be much bigger when we're beside it?

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.html: ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.

result.eng: It's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ga: ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.orig: ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óige
result.html: ba mhór an truaighe nach bhfuair mé foghlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.
result.ponchtml: ba ṁór an truaiġe naċ ḃfuair mé foġlaim i m'óigeIt's a shame I didn't get an education when I was young.

result.eng: They haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ga: ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.orig: ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huair
result.html: ní bhfuair siad aon ghreim le níl a fhios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.
result.ponchtml: ní ḃfuair siad aon ġreim le níl a ḟios agam cá huairThey haven't had anything to eat since I don't know when.

result.eng: When I have a little money I'll send for you.
result.ga: nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinne
result.orig: nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinne
result.html: nuair a bheas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfidh mé fá do choinneWhen I have a little money I'll send for you.
result.ponchtml: nuair a ḃeas dornán beag airgid agam cuirfiḋ mé fá do ċoinneWhen I have a little money I'll send for you.

result.eng: There's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ga: níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.orig: níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúl
result.html: níl contúirt ort dearmad a dhéanamh díom nuair a bheas mé ar shiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?
result.ponchtml: níl contúirt ort dearmad a ḋéanaṁ díom nuair a ḃeas mé ar ẛiúlThere's no chance you'd forget me when I'm away?

result.eng: I'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ga: beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.orig: beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duit
result.html: beidh mise anseo fá do choinne ag teacht duitI'll be here for you when you come back.
result.ponchtml: beiḋ mise anseo fá do ċoinne ag teaċt duitI'll be here for you when you come back.

result.eng: It's easy for you to stop drinking when you haven't started.
result.ga: is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár thúsaigh tú air
result.orig: is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár thúsaigh tú air
result.html: is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár thúsaigh tú airIt's easy for you to stop drinking when you haven't started.
result.ponchtml: is furast duitse stad den ól nuair nár ṫúsaiġ tú airIt's easy for you to stop drinking when you haven't started.

result.eng: When everybody was asleep...
result.ga: nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaí
result.orig: nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaí
result.html: nuair a bheadh an saol fá chónaíWhen everybody was asleep...
result.ponchtml: nuair a ḃeaḋ an saol fá ċónaíWhen everybody was asleep...

result.eng: Babaí was very happy to see him. {to welcome him when he arrived}
result.ga: bhí lúcháir mhór ar bhabaí roimhe
result.orig: bhí lúcháir mhór ar bhabaí roimhe
